TopicTitle: Did you know that on the back of the A.I.R.B.R.A.K.E is a Kraken?

Articles.Content: I'll post a pic if I can!
Hate to burst your bubble, but actually, it's a Kerbal ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Yeah, I thought it was a Kerbal too.

Pics! Pics! Pics!

> 
> Hate to burst your bubble, but actually, it's a Kerbal ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

It is. It's a warning to not put kerbals in between the brake and the brake mount.

> 
> It is. It's a warning to not put kerbals in between the brake and the brake mount.

Like kerbals really need a warning not to....OH NO! POOR HARLO!

Perhaps the picture means that if u cram a kerbal into the airbrake and close it, it turns into a kraken-drive and gives you infinite dV at the cost of torturing the poor kerbal.

Anyways, since we are talking about kerbal exploits, at least they fixed the one that would instantly break the game when you docked 2+ claws to a kerbal.
have to admit, at first I thought it was a kraken, took me a moment to realize it was a kerbal!

> 
> Perhaps the picture means that if u cram a kerbal into the airbrake and close it, it turns into a kraken-drive and gives you infinite dV at the cost of torturing the poor kerbal.
> Anyways, since we are talking about kerbal exploits, at least they fixed the one that would instantly break the game when you docked 2+ claws to a kerbal.

Once I get the claw, I'll need to test if I can drive a rover into a claw-docking without switching away or killing the game...

Oh lol, it is a Kerbal!

My bubble burst and depressurized.
There IS a note regarding the "Kracken" in one of the IVA views.. the lab I think.

> 
> Perhaps the picture means that if u cram a kerbal into the airbrake and close it, it turns into a kraken-drive and gives you infinite dV at the cost of torturing the poor kerbal.
> Anyways, since we are talking about kerbal exploits, at least they fixed the one that would instantly break the game when you docked 2+ claws to a kerbal.

thank god for that, most my ships are built around a Double Clawed Kerbal generator........
